title: Tigers walk in fans' shoes on Caravan
subtitle: Tigers walk in fans' shoes on Caravan
body: AUBURN HILLS, Mich. -- Before Jose Valverde was baseball's perfect closer, he was a bagger.  After Doug Fister is done being one baseball's underrated starters, he might end up becoming a crime-stopper.  Even if he doesn't, at least we all know where his "One Shot, One Kill" philosophy of throwing strikes and inducing quick outs came from. Jason Beck is a reporter for MLB.com. Read Beck's Blog and follow him on Twitter @beckjason. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Jason Beck
